name: NUMBER BALL
description:
It is a combination of golf and billiards, a new game that is not entirely new, but a bit new.

CONTROLS

[Hold]    Adjust the hitting angle

[Release] Hit the number

INSTRUCTIONS

Aim at the floor with the same number. Floors with the same number on them will disappear. When the floor reaches the left edge, the game is over.

Created with crisp-game-lib
